name: Shape Up (itch)
description:
Note: This game can only be played with an Xbox 360 or Xbox One Controller.

Created for a programming assessment through the Academy of Interactive Entertainment Melbourne.

Controls:

Move - Left Joystick
Aim and Shoot - Right Joystick

Music:

Created by Perfect Storm
https://soundcloud.com/perfectstorm11

If you enjoyed the game please leave a comment.
